title: 1st Birthday Gray Sleeveless Outfit. First Birthday Romper. One Shirt. Baby Boy 1st Birthday. One Baby Boy Birthday Outfit.
tags: 1st birthday outfit,1st birthday,1st birthday shirt,first birthday,boy 1st birthday,baby boy outfit,baby boy romper,baby fashion,trendy baby,baby's 1st birthday,1st birthday romper,wild one,wild and one
description:
1st birthday Romper! This adorable gray romper is the perfect addition to your little one's first birthday!
* Available in 6 month, 9 month, 12 month, & 18 month sizes.  Also available in 2T and 3T. 
* Gray romper with White design.
* Romper is a full length romper. 
* Snaps at one shoulder for easy on and off. Please note there are no snaps at the leg, to change a diaper the romper will need to be unsnapped at the shoulder.

You may choose to add a child's name and the number "1" to the back of the romper. (If you select the front and back option, please remember to add the name you'd like to the "Personalization" box).  The name and the number "1" automatically come together with the front & back option.  If you do not want one or the other, please let me know in the "Notes to Seller" section.  
If no name is wanted please put "none" in the box.

Sizing information can be found in the photo section. 

Please. please, please check measurements to ensure proper size. The amount of stretch is less than an the average bodysuit.
The best way to measure is to take an existing bodysuit and measure from the middle of the shoulder to the crotch area.  Make sure to take into account any growth that may take place if you order in advance.
 
Based on our other rompers, we believe this romper runs a little small.  Please use measurements to ensure proper fit.

This romper consists of a 100% Cotton material. 

Wanting the writing in a different color? Please contact us prior to ordering for options!

Care instructions: 
Machine wash cold with like colors.
Lay flat to dry.
Do not use fabric softener or bleach.

This listing is for the romper only, but...
We also carry accessories and Mom, Dad, & sibling shirts all available in the "One Birthday" section of our shop. Check out the link below:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/2troubleboys?ref=seller-platform-mcnav&section_id=25625515

description:
A beautiful hardcover book, quarter-bound in leather

Raised bands on spine
Silver finishing
Detailed leatherwork
Black and white headbands
Traditional spine title
Personalised inscription
Size 210 x 140mm 

Price:
This listing is for the commission of professional bookbinding work. The all-inclusive price includes the bookbinding fee, the finished product as advertised and tracked delivery. 

Authenticity:
I am a professional bookbinder with over 30 years experience. My commissions and fine bindings are collected all over the world by bibliophiles, book enthusiasts and art collectors. 

Inscription:
Optional personalised inscription on inside cover. Popular examples are Jane Smith December 2023 or Ex Libris Jane Smith or anything up to 250 characters. 

Ex Libris means from the library of / book belongs to. Your inscription will be positioned and formatted so it looks the absolute best it possibly can. 

Binding:
Presented in black leathercloth and Windsor black bookcloth.

Text-block:
The complete and unabridged published novel. Paperback edition in English language. 

Bookbinding Commission:
The price advertised is the fee for my services as a professional bookbinder, and a promise to deliver your book safely, as pictured* and as described. The book text-block has been paid for by myself, this includes all usual royalties paid in full. The fee you are paying is for the commission of bespoke work, for my expertise in bookbinding. The highly skilled work will provide protection and longevity, there are no alterations to the pages of the published book text-block. 

*Depending on the number of pages of the published novel, the depth of the book may be different than pictured.

description:
Wedding Photo Frame ‚Äì Preserve Your Most Cherished Moments

Celebrate your love story with our personalized wedding photo frames, designed to create lasting tributes to your most precious memories. Each frame is beautifully crafted, offering a unique way to showcase your favorite wedding moments. Featuring a design of your choice, each photo is meticulously applied to the surface with care and attention to detail, creating a timeless keepsake to treasure for years to come.

title: 1901 Original Maine Flag Trucker hat, Vintage Maine Patch Hat, Leather Patch Cap, Maine Flag Trucker Hat Maine Gifts from Maine Lover ME Hat
tags: Original Maine Flag,1901 Maine Flag,Vintage Maine Flag,Maine Hat,Maine Flag Cap,Maine Patch Hat,Maine Trucker Hat,Lone Pine Hat,Maine Dad Hat,Portland ME Hat,State of Maine Hat,Maine State Flag,Leather Patch Hats
description:
Discover the classic charm of our Richardson 112 Old 1901 Vintage Maine Flag trucker hat with an originally designed leatherette patch that displays your love of the Original Maine Flag.

Hat Specifications:
- Design: 6 Panel Structured Trucker Style
- Structured, Mid-Profile
- Multiple Color Combinations
- Blend of Cotton-Poly and Breathable Nylon Mesh
- Adjustable Snapback Closure, One Size Fits Most

Care Instructions: 
To maintain your hat's condition, hand wash it gently in cold water, targeting only the areas that need cleaning. Use a damp cloth for spot cleaning and avoid submerging the hat in water, especially around the patch. Avoid cleaning hats in washing machines and dishwashers to prevent damage.

Return and Exchange Policy: 
All of our hats are custom made to order. As with most small business craft sellers here on Etsy, we do not carry stock or inventory of our products like Amazon and the big box stores do, so thank you for understanding our no returns/no exchanges policy. However, please do reach out to us for assistance if you feel there might be a defect in your hat as we stand by the quality of our products and are always willing and open to fair resolutions for both parties. 

Delivery Terms: 
We remind our customers to ensure a secure drop-off location for packages. Once a package is marked as delivered, we cannot offer refunds for stolen or lost items post-delivery. In such cases, please understand it is up to the buyer to contact their local Post Office or specified delivery carrier for assistance.

Thank you for choosing 207 Threads for your custom headwear needs!
